description: A widow, Saeko works as a researcher at the Toto Bio-Medical Laboratory and a part time biology professor at a university. Her full name is Saeko Nishiwaki Misaki. After her daughter, Hitomi, dies from cancer, Saeko becomes obsessed with her loss to the point that she cultivates Hitomi`s cancerous cells into a biological mutant creature named Wasted 13 in the Toto Bio-Medical Laboratory.
name: Misaki Saeko
